data.name: BURN THE WITCH
data.detailed_description:
game on PRE-ALPHA stadia. you can see gameplay video what been recorded on may 2021.

yes, indeed.
BURN THE WITCH is a metroidvania in dark fantasy setting.

  • you can jump and also you can attack.

  • you can run and kill nasty witches. so cool.

  • we have some platforming elements and tree of skills. so cute.

data.short_description: THEY TOLD ME TO MAKE BURN THE WITCH. METROIDVANIA IN THE DARK FANTASY SETTING. I'M NOT AGAINST IT
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: 2,4 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 512 МБ
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: ОС: Windows 8/10/11 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, Radeon R9-270
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: mac OS High Sierra 10.13.6
  • Processor: 2,4 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 512 МБ
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.15.7 Catalina or higher
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz 4Core Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560 4 GB or Metal-capable equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
